title: 【矮人工作室】【1.4.2】【ssp】更多矿车mod
author: 压力马斯内
txt_content:
更多矿车mod


mod介绍

Steve’s Carts Mod添加了自动挖矿车，TNT车，农用车，铁道建设车等。你可以用这些车来运输你的物品，还有这款MOD搭配Better Than Wolves Mod 效果很不错哦！

视频介绍：

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzY5NDA4NzEy.html



下载:

http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=106171&uk=2433492663

安装步骤:
1.下载forge和更多矿车mod
2.将forge放到minecraft.jar中
3.运行一遍游戏
4.将更多矿车mod放入mods文件夹中
5.玩吧！
提示：
这个mod配合工业mod更好玩哦！！！

矮人工作室logo:




2344192npinkr2dp1egizp[1].png (53.43 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2012-10-28 11:51 上传





787878b搬运

replies.author: q343343
replies.txt_content: 收下了

replies.author: scott
replies.txt_content:
请翻译这些内容：Description
This mod currently adds 25 carts to the game. These are designed to complete certain tasks to help you with for example mining, building rails, farming wheat or traveling along your rails. Each cart also has its own model and animations to make it look neat. Furthermore a few new rail types have been added and also a few blocks. The blocks will help you to detect different types of carts, load and unload your cart with items or create carts as well as getting information about them. That last block, the cart manager, will contain all the information required to use the carts. Some information about the cart manager can be see further down. Here below is also a video showing you some of the carts.
Information
Since the Cart Manager contains information about all the carts and blocks there's no reason to write about them here as well. Instead this section will just give you information about the cart manager.
If you feel like watching a video instead of reading.
The cart manager's interface will show you a map of all the carts(and the rails and blocks). Drag with your mouse to navigate the map. Clicking on a cart will open its crafting menu. Here you can see its recipe, it's total cost and the resources you're missing to be able to craft it. If you have all the resources you can just grab the cart from the crafting grid. The resources used will be removed from your inventory.

You can click the lore button for the cart's lore. The information button shows you the information about the cart. The list there is a list of all the cart's topics. By clicking on one its content will show. Every cart usually have a few topics but some insane ones have about 30. You can also click on the model button, this will show you a 3D model of the cart. This is a simulation of how the cart would look like in the world. Click the different buttons to simulate different scenarios.

Back at the map you can also select the arrow to be able to upgrade the cart manager. A tier one cart manager can only create tier one carts, a tier two cart manager can create tier one and tier two carts and so on. There's four tiers in total.

There's also a recycler button at the map, clicking this will bring you the recycle menu. Putting any cart or cart component in the recycle slot will recycle the items used to create it. These items will be added to your inventory.还有这个
